requirement_text: We need an option for users to easily reset forgotten passwords, possibly through a security question or email verification.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive an email with a password reset link, so that I can regain access to my account when Ive forgotten my password.
As a user, I want to reset my password through either a security question or email verification, so that I can regain access to my account after forgetting my password.

requirement_text: The app should support gestures for navigation to make it easier and more intuitive to use on touchscreen devices.

user_stories.user_story: As a mobile app user, I want to navigate through the app using gestures, so that I can easily and intuitively use the app on touchscreen devices.
As a mobile app user, I want to be able to navigate through the app using gestures, so that I can interact with the app more efficiently and intuitively on touchscreen devices.
